channel.title: Top 5 Favorite Games
channel.description:
Hey all. New to the community, and was curious to get to know some of you. Never really used a forum, but I check this site daily, so I figured I'd give it a try. So, to the point.
What are your top 5 favorite non-HL games?
Since you all are members of this forum, I'm assuming the HL series easily falls into this list, probably near the top. Its true for me.
These should be the games you couldn't stop playing, enjoyed every second of, even if it wasn't the best game ever or its as old as jesus.
1) Halo - just the first one, I played the crap out of it. 2's campaign was horrible, 3 was meh. (anyone playing reach? could use some buddies to own faces with)
2) Metal Gear Solid 4 - the entire series is phenomenal, but that's what made 4 so much better. **SPOILER** I nearly @#$% my pants (are we allowed to curse in here? don't want to offend) when snake returned to shadow moses, and then again when you got to drive rex.
3) Assasin's Creed (series) - besides the rinse and repeat in the 1st game, every moment has been awesome.
4) Mass Effect (series) - ah-mae-zing.
**EDIT** 5 was FFVII, good game, but had to be replaced.
5) ChronoTrigger - Momentary lapse in memory. this is by far my favorite rpg of all time. Saw it in my snes in my living room after I made this post. Had to put it on here.
A little mainstream, but they were for a good reason. So, lay 'em down.

item.title: Top 5 Favorite Games
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
Minecraft - Open world at its best.
Deus Ex - Open level design at its best.
Half Life - Linear level design at its best.
Goldeneye - Split screen multiplayer at its best.
Planetside - Online multiplayer at its best.

For me anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Top 5 Favorite Games
item.dc:creator: GARD
item.description:
Kind of hard narrowing it down to a top 5, even without HL-titles.
Going with an “actual hours of my life i have spent playing the game”-approach instead.

  1. Red Faction 1
  2. GTA SA (if it’s the whole GTA-series it would probably take the #1 spot)
  3. Crash Team Racing (recently sat down and completed adventure 100% on the ps3, had never done that before…)
  4. Pokemon Blue/Yellow for the Pocket. (Quite possibly higher…)
  5. Diablo 2 or GTA 2

Close:
Europa Universalis 3, Team Fortress 2, C&C: Tiberian Sun, Madden '07 & '11, Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3 & Wario Land 2…

Read full topic

item.title: Top 5 Favorite Games
item.dc:creator: SceaRd
item.description:
An impossible task but I’ll just throw some good games.

Crash Team Racing because it is endlessly entertaining.
Squaresoft Final Fantasy games (SquareEnix what have you done?)
Dawn of War: Soulstorm mainly because it’s the best LAN game ever.
The Witcher 1 because the second one didn’t have enough HC fantasy and sex like the first one.
And either Fallout 3 or HL2. Can’t decide.

Read full topic

Honourable Mentions

Final Fantasy 6/7, can´t decide
Metal Gear (whole series)
Castlevania (the first one)
StarCraft (all of them)
Team Fortress 2 (first multiplayer-only game I´ve ever liked)

that’s more than 5 games, stupid.
